spoilers.title: #ONEPIECE1174 I now understand why so many leakers (including myself) were confused by the title. After reading @TheWillOfMarco 's translation, I'm certain the title is about Luffy and Loki, who are b
spoilers.text: #ONEPIECE1174 I now understand why so many leakers (including myself) were confused by the title. After reading @TheWillOfMarco 's translation, I'm certain the title is about Luffy and Loki, who are both the highlight of the chapter and make all of Elbaph tremble.

misc.title: #ONEPIECE1174 From: @Mugiwara_23 : "So you can get an idea of how big Loki is when he transforms into a dragon: this giant Luffy is much smaller than just one of Loki‚Äôs horns in dragon form. If I say
misc.text: #ONEPIECE1174 From: @Mugiwara_23 : "So you can get an idea of how big Loki is when he transforms into a dragon: this giant Luffy is much smaller than just one of Loki‚Äôs horns in dragon form. If I say Dragon Loki is 50 times bigger than Dragon Kaidou, I think I‚Äôm still seriously underestimating it XD"

misc.title: So yeah, Luffy and Loki are described as the strongest beings with this title. The whole scenario where the mothers fail, but then Luffy and Loki appear and save them, already suggests that the title
misc.text: So yeah, Luffy and Loki are described as the strongest beings with this title. The whole scenario where the mothers fail, but then Luffy and Loki appear and save them, already suggests that the title is directed at Luffy and Loki, who both display such incredible power that they shake the entire Sun World. Loki and Luffy are the strongest!!

misc.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è #ONEPIECE1174 : CHAPTER TRANSLATION - PART 3 - FINAL PART‚ö†Ô∏è (The parents and their kids fall onto something like solid ground, surrounded by mountains. The kids are no longer surrounded by Sommers'
misc.text: ‚ö†Ô∏è #ONEPIECE1174 : CHAPTER TRANSLATION - PART 3 - FINAL PART‚ö†Ô∏è (The parents and their kids fall onto something like solid ground, surrounded by mountains. The kids are no longer surrounded by Sommers' thorns.) Everyone: Huh? Ripley: Colon‚Ä¶ where‚Ä¶ are we? Colon: I don‚Äôt know!! But everyone‚Äôs alive!! Parent: Urgh‚Ä¶ Kids: Mom! Luffy: It‚Äôs my Gomu Gomu no Hara Senbei (Gum Gum Belly Rice Cracker)!! It‚Äôs prickly, so hurry up and get off!! (It turns out the ‚Äúsolid ground‚Äù they fell onto was Luffy, who transformed himself into a giant rice cracker, resting on something enormous. LOL) Colon: Eh!? Luffy!? Loki: Hey, you guys!! Once we surface‚Ä¶ get off my back immediately, got it?! You‚Äôll just get in the way of my fight! Colon: Back?! Luffy: You guys just came falling down out of nowhere. Good thing we were passing by!! Loki: That was unintentional!! I‚Äôm a Destroyer!! I won‚Äôt guarantee anyone‚Äôs safety!! Here we go‚Ä¶‚Ä¶!! (It turns out that the ‚Äúsomething enormous‚Äù is Loki, and the mountains were actually spiky thorns on his back! We can see Loki‚Äôs eye completely, without the blindfold.) (At the Sun World, snow starts to fall and thunder starts to rumble.) Sommers: Snow? What's this all of a sudden? Thunder? (The trees at the Sun World starts to bounce.) Sommers: What the...?! The trees are bobbing...?! Jarul: This rhythm... Giant: Elbaph is shaking...!! Jarul: "On a day of 'thundersnow,' a phenomenon so rare in this world...!!! A 'giant beast' appears, shrouding the sky... along with the 'Drums of Liberation'... Sommers: WHA...?! (ON THE EPIC FINAL DOUBLE PAGE OF THE CHAPTER, we can see Loki has transformed into an ENORMOUS black, winged dragon. Luffy is in his Gear 5 Gigant form, alongside Ragnir, who is in its squirrel form. No Devil Fruit name is revealed in this chapter.) (Lightning is striking down the MMAs below them.) Jarul: ‚ÄúThe ‚ÄòSun God‚Äô‚Ä¶ shall appear!‚Äù Luffy: Ahyahyahya~~~!!! Ragnir: Kuriririri!!! Luffy: That‚Äôs hilarious!!! Look at how big you are!!! End Note: Elbaph, the time of liberation has come!!! BREAK NEXT WEEK
